task.title: Developing a sample information set
task.shortdesc: This section contains a brief tutorial designed to help you learn how to use to create a small information set.

context.p: You are designing a small, DITA-based information set about dental health. Your client is the Human Resources department of Acme Corporation, a company that wants to reduce costs by having their employees take better care of their teeth.
Here is what the DITA map will look like in after you have created it:

image.alt: View of the dental hygiene sample after creation
